content.content: 1. The following are provincial priorities prescribed for the purposes of sections 284.10, 284.11 and 284.11.1 of the Act: 1.  Building 1.5 million new residential units by December 31, 2031. 2.  Constructing and maintaining infrastructure to support housing, including, i.  transit, ii.  roads, iii.  utilities, and iv.  servicing.
content.raw_html:
1. The following are provincial priorities prescribed for the purposes of sections 284.10, 284.11 and 284.11.1 of the Act:

1.  Building 1.5 million new residential units by December 31, 2031.

2.  Constructing and maintaining infrastructure to support housing, including,

i.  transit,

ii.  roads,

iii.  utilities, and

iv.  servicing.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
